review: Great alternative to buying a smart TV. So nice to be able to control from a smart phone. Just wish it had a few additional features.- An on-screen menu would be nice, and simple to implement with HDMI CEC. Could be done similar to the RasPlex media center image.- Ethernet plug in the back would make streaming better when one has poor Wifi signal.- A windows / linux application for streaming an entire screen output shouldn't be any more difficult to implement than the Chrome browser streaming.
